  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.MantaBackendProps.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  using HashiCorp.Cdktf;
  
  new MantaBackendProps {
      string Account,
      string KeyId,
      string Path,
      bool InsecureSkipTlsVerify = null,
      string KeyMaterial = null,
      string ObjectName = null,
      string Url = null,
      string User = null
  };
  ```
